sen.j: 千千速比売命（ちちはやひめのみこと、生没年不詳）は、孝霊天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Princess Chichihaya Hime (Chichihaya Hime no Mikoto; the date of birth and death unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.
Princess Chichihaya Hime (Chichihaya Hime no Mikoto; the date of birth and death unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.
Princess Chichihaya Hime (Chichihaya Hime no Mikoto; the date of birth and death unknown) was a princess of the Emperor Korei.

sen.j: 母は、春日之千千速真若比売。
sen.e: The mother of Princess Chichihaya Hime was 'Kasuga no Chichihaya Mawakahime' (春日之 千千速 真若比売).
The mother of Princess Chichihaya Hime was Kasuga no Chichihaya Mawakahime.
sen.cmt: シングルクオートを削除しました。
sen.e: The mother of Princess Chichihaya Hime was Kasuga no Chichihaya Mawakahime.

sen.j: 異母兄弟に孝元天皇、倭迹迹日百襲媛命らがいる。
sen.e: The Emperor Kogen (孝元天皇) and Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime [(倭迹迹日百襲媛命) Yamatototo Himomoso Hime no Mikoto] were the paternal half brother and sister to Princess Chichihaya Hime.
The Emperor Kogen and Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime were the paternal half-brother and sister of Princess Chichihaya Hime.
sen.cmt: ハイフンとof の変更しました。
sen.e: The Emperor Kogen and Princess Yamatototo Himomoso Hime were the paternal half-brother and sister of Princess Chichihaya Hime.
Princess Chichihaya Hime appeared exclusively in the writings of the 'Kojiki' (A Record of Ancient Matter).
Princess Chichihaya Hime appeared exclusively in the writings of the 'Kojiki' (A Record of Ancient Matter).
Princess Chichihaya Hime appeared exclusively in the writings of the 'Kojiki' (A Record of Ancient Matter).
Other achievements of Princess Chichihaya Hime are unknown.
